scripts.build:android: NODE_ENV=production npm run gen-assets && npm run build && npx cap sync android && npx cap run android
scripts.release:android: NODE_ENV=production npm run gen-assets && npm run build && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cp app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release.apk ../build/satlas-android-release.apk && cd .. && adb install build/satlas-android-release.apk
scripts.dev:android: NODE_ENV=development npx cap sync android && npx cap run android --live-reload --port=5173
scripts.dev:android-build: NODE_ENV=development npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug && cd ..
scripts.dev:ios: NODE_ENV=development npx cap sync && npx cap run ios --live-reload --port=5173
scripts.build:ios: NODE_ENV=production npm run gen-assets && npm run build && npx cap sync ios && npx cap run ios
scripts.nuke:ios: rm -rf ios && npx cap add ios && npm run setup:ios
scripts.release:ios: NODE_ENV=production npm run gen-assets && npm run build && npx cap sync ios && cd ios/App && agvtool next-version -all && xcodebuild archive -workspace App.xcworkspace -scheme App -configuration Release -destination 'generic/platform=iOS' && cd ../..
